title: Plaque, "War of 1812 Battle Scene"
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with moulded rim; relief decoration of battle scene with soldiers in ancient Roman dress; inscription underneath (in Russian): "The Liberation of Moscow 1812."

tombstone.epitaph:
Plaque, "War of 1812 Battle Scene".
Porcelain (bisque). The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-255.
